comment.body: @Pexo: Yo, chief. I'd hate to be a hassle, but I have absolutely no clue how this shit works. I think I'm missing something.

@Pexo: Nah, I understand the general gist of it, but all I'm looking at right now (as I'm typing this) is essentially my own comment page so to speak. The hub itself is (as in the pink page with all the text and all that) is just text. So, I'm a bit confused here.
@Pexo: I see, I see. Thank you.
